action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid. Top row all X. Right column all X. Middle row has X in positions 3, 4, and 5. All other positions are empty squares.

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

This is my DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid. Top row all X. Right column all X. Middle row has X in positions 3, 4, and 5. All other positions are empty squares.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the square in the top-left corner (row 1, column 1) marked with an X in your grid?

This is my DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid with a 3x3 block of X's in the center, surrounded by empty squares.
QUESTION: Is the square in the top-left corner (row 1, column 1) marked with an X in your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

QUESTION: Is the square in row 3, column 3 (the center of the grid) marked with an X in your grid?

ANSWER: Yes

Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the square in row 3, column 1 (leftmost square in the third row) marked with an X in your grid?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Is the square in row 3, column 1 (leftmost square in the third row) marked with an X in your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your grid and the other grid described the same?  Write "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are the same grid or "DECISION: different grids" if you think they are different grids. Do not add anything else.
